title: Carto Sam
author: Archivist Eryndra
pages: Cartographer Sam's writings are enchanting tales of exploration and mapping, detailing biomes with precision and wonder.
His guidance balances the danger of wilderness with the joy of discovery, rendering his works vital to every adventurer's library.
Sam's six publications span the world's biomes and are rich in wisdom and practicalityâ€”a treasure trove for would-be navigators.
